divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to get some fresh air It was flying in the sky glowing A fireball and I called my family outside and my aunt got a video of it on her phone It was round glowing and it was going in a straight line Shocked and scared It flew away
Summary: Glowing orb that made no sound and was traveling southeast and was followed by a helicopter five minutes after
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were 4 other sightings in Philadelphia on or around January 1st 2012
